format:
  html:
    include-in-header:
      text: |
        <script>
        MathJax = {
            tex: {
                tags: 'ams'  // should be 'ams', 'none', or 'all'
            }
        };
        </script>
    include-after-body:
      text: |
        <script type="text/javascript" src="javascript/eqn_annotation.js"></script>
---

<!-- Numbered equation -->
\begin{equation}
1 = 1
\end{equation}

<!-- Unnumbered equation -->
\begin{equation*}
2 = 2
\end{equation*}

<!-- Tagged equation -->
\begin{equation}
3 = 3 \tag{tagabc}
\end{equation}

<!-- Labelled equation -->
\begin{equation}
4 = 4 \label{labelabc}
\end{equation}

A `\ref \eqref` example: \ref{labelabc} \eqref{labelabc}

<!-- Numbered align -->
\begin{align}
5 &= 5 \\
  &= 5
\end{align}

<!-- Unnumbered align -->
\begin{align*}
5 &= 5  \\
  &= 5
\end{align*}

<!-- Align with tag and label -->
\begin{align}
5 &= 5 \tag{tagttt}      \\
  &= 5 \label{labelttt}
\end{align}

<!-- Align with unnumbered lines -->
\begin{align}
5 &= 5  \\
  &= 1  \nonumber \\
  &+ 1  \nonumber \\
  &+ 3  \\
  &= 1 \nonumber \\
  & + 1 \nonumber \\
  & + 1 \nonumber \\
  & + 1 \nonumber \\
  & + 1
\end{align}
